channel.title: Got some stuff that might help people out on some things
channel.description:
[b]Hi guys I was just on RuneScape and then Right clicked and Clicked Viewed Source and caught at sight at a Link so I clicked it and it took me to a Website with some random Tutorials/Helpers. It doesnt really teach much about coding but some about Fourms and stuff Lists, Texts, Links and Tables and such.[/b]
But when you get to the Site scroll Down until you see Quick Table Contents or even use CTRL F to search it.
Heres the Site: http://www.w3.org/TR/1999/REC-html401-19991224/#minitoc
Please dont flame me if this doesn't please you because it just came to my Mind that I'd post it here. Mod please dont lock if theres a section please Move it ;)

item.title: Got some stuff that might help people out on some things
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

The W3C is an organisation that standardizes Web Technologies.
They are responsible for HTML, CSS, XML etc and the HTTP Proticol

Its nothing to do with runescape, all sites are linked to it, including this one:

Read full topic

item.title: Got some stuff that might help people out on some things

item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Hi guys I was just on RuneScape and then Right clicked and Clicked Viewed Source and caught at sight at a Link so I clicked it and it took me to a Website with some random Tutorials/Helpers. It doesnt really teach much about coding but some about Fourms and stuff Lists, Texts, Links and Tables and such.

But when you get to the Site scroll Down until you see Quick Table Contents or even use CTRL F to search it.

Heres the Site:
http://www.w3.org/TR/1999/REC-html401-19991224/#minitoc

Please dont flame me if this doesn’t please you because it just came to my Mind that I’d post it here.
